I really recommend Royse777.   "▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬  AnonymixerOwner of Anonymixer[   M O R E   R E V I E W S   &   V O U C H E S   H E R E   ]F.A.QsHow do you secure escrow funds?I have a 2 of 2 Multi-Sig bitcoin wallet, each key are accessed from two different devices. Besides, I have enough bitcoin in my possessions stored in the cold storage to cover any loss of fund from the escrow address. Your funds are safe and secure in my possession.

comments.body: A few updates:Quote from: AB de Royse777 on August 12, 2024, 10:29:57 AMNew signature campaign is live! Cryptomus.Quote from: AB de Royse777 on August 12, 2024, 10:22:45 AM What is Cryptomus?__________________Cryptomus is a crypto payment gateway, code audited and approved by Certik. Cryptomus makes it easy for you to plug into digital payments. Cryptomus allows you to  create invoices  for your e-commerce business, offer  recurring payments  for you business. You can allow your customers to top up their personal credit in any amount and use it without delay. Like Paypal, using Cryptomus you can create an invoice, share the link and get paid – it's an easy payment solution for your online business of any kind.There is two versions of the campaign. The url of both versions is one the campaign public spreadsheet.Altcoinstalks is yet to launch though.We may see another new project is launching their signature campaign with R7 this week.Stay in touch.Quote from: AB de Royse777 on August 09, 2024, 04:52:18 PMNew signature campaign is live! The Change Ltd.Quote from: AB de Royse777 on August 09, 2024, 03:59:16 PM What can you expect from The Change Ltd?__________________The Change Ltd provides  The fastest possible processing of transactions  in any direction. There are more than 250 coins available pools of cryptocurrencies, The Change Ltd provides unique functionality of your personal account, it also provides flexible and transparent commission system. You will receive truly clean money only from their exchange pools. The simple API provides you the fastest possible development of your own project, the innovative bot is ahead of competitors with completely new functionality. Join The Change Ltd and become part of the next generation of cryptocurrency exchange!We have two versions of the campaign. The url of both versions is one the campaign public spreadsheet.A few more campaigns are in the pipeline and hopefully we will launch them soon.Information are regularly updated on the Service board topic: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5328445.0
